snippet: Andrea Constand filed a lawsuit against a former district attorney who declined to file criminal charges against Bill Cosby.
abstract: Andrea Constand, who accused Bill Cosby of drugging and molesting her in 2004, sues Bruce Castor, former district attorney in Pennsylvania who declined to file criminal charges against Cosby.
lead_paragraph: Andrea Constand filed a lawsuit against a former district attorney who declined to file criminal charges against Bill Cosby.

headline.print_headline: Accuser Sues Ex-Prosecutor Who Didn’t Charge Cosby
headline.main: Accuser Sues Ex-Prosecutor Who Didn’t Charge Bill Cosby
